about_the_game:
problem Fixing

If your Windows system cannot run the game properly, you can run wushowhide-1.diagcab included in the zip file to fix it.

Selection Interface

Click the button to select the mode, There are story mode, vs mode, counter mode available.

Click on the arrow to switch between fighters, allowing you to view the fighter’s appearance, name, and skill settings. Each fighter has two exclusive skills and one universal skill for blocking. There are a total of 84 fighters available to use.

(PLAYER1 can switch fighters by pressing the AD keys, while PLAYER2 can switch fighters by pressing the left and right keys.)

Click on the arrow to switch between with and without props. There are a total of 84 props available to use.

(PLAYER1 can switch between with and without items by pressing the J key, while PLAYER2 can switch between with and without items by pressing NumPad 1.)

Click on the arrow to switch between PLAYER and COMPUTER, allowing you to play against a computer or watch a computer play against another computer(Cyber Beast-fighting).

(PLAYER1 can switch between a real person and a computer by pressing the WS keys, while PLAYER2 can switch between a real person and a computer by pressing the up and down keys.)

Click on the arrow to switch between BO(best of x), from BO1 to BO21.

(PLAYER1 can switch between BO by pressing the KL keys, while PLAYER2 can switch between BO by pressing NumPad 2 and NumPad 3.)

Click on the arrow to switch between full tutorial, only item tutorial, and no tutorial.

Control Instructions

PLAYER1

Move：WASD

Skill：JK

Def：L

Item：;(Semicolon)

PLAYER2

Move：↑↓←→(Directional keys)

Skill：NumPad 12

Def：NumPad 3

Item：NumPad Enter

Some skills have a CD (Cooldown) time.

Many skills can be cast while moving with the directional keys to adjust the position of the spell cast.

Flexible positioning, masterful use of skills, and skillful blocking are key to overcoming enemies.

problem Fixing

If your Windows system cannot run the game properly, you can run wushowhide-1.diagcab included in the zip file to fix it.

Click on the arrow to switch between with and without props. There are a total of 84 props available to use.

(PLAYER1 can switch between with and without items by pressing the J key, while PLAYER2 can switch between with and without items by pressing NumPad 1.)

name: Duel of games
short_description: In the real world, the Game of the Year is about who is more fun to play,while in the gaming world,the Game of the Year is about who can fight better.In order to compete for the title of Game of the Year,games transform into fighters and engage in combat.Duel of classic game protagonists,pvp/pve/eve
